name: Cheat Zone
description:
Cheat zone is a puzzle game where you need to find a way to the door that sends you to the next level with the help of a computer where you can improve your stats.

Story:

●You went to space alone for visiting Mars. After you arrived some aliens found you and kidnapped you.They put you in a simulation to test your smartness. If you fail to complete 3 levels they kill you but if you succeed you get freedom.

Guide:

●They also forgot a computer where you can change your stats how you want.
●A camera is spying the computer so take care to not enter in its range.
●There are also boxes which you can move to get access to higher zones.
●When you are near of a hack computer, a hacking screen is appears. You can change your stats there.

Controls:

W A S D - Move
Space - Jump
Hold R - Restart

Credits:

Kustt - Programmer
Jose - Programmer
Sindik - Art
Lucas - Sounds

Program:

Unity engine with C#

Thanks for downloading!
